question: The International Day for the Elimination of Racial Discrimination was observed on __________.
explanation: The International Day for the Elimination of Racial Discrimination is observed every year on 21st March. The International Day for the Elimination of Racial Discrimination is observed every year on 21st March. Theme for International Day for the Elimination of Racial Discrimination 2018: Promoting tolerance, inclusion, unity and respect for diversity in the context of combating racial discrimination.
